text: Nevi'im (, "Prophets") is the second section of the Hebrew Bible, the Tanakh. It includes: * Book of Joshua * Judges * The two Books of Samuel * The two Books of Kings * Isaiah * Book of Jeremiah * Book of Ezekiel * The Twelve "minor prophets": ** Book of Hosea ** Book of Joel ** Book of Amos ** Book of Obadiah ** Jonah ** Book of Micah ** Book of Nahum ** Book of Habakkuk ** Book of Zephaniah ** Book of Haggai **Zechariah ** Book of Malachi *
title: Nevi'im
